ProjectTitle: Development of a CRISPR-based tool for localized random mutagenesis of biosynthetic pathways
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/06/2023
You mention that you will closely monitor the MIBBI, these already have standards relevant for your datatypes, eg MINSEQE, MIxS, MIFlowCyt for more information see https://fairsharing.org/MIBBI. Metadata may als be added by your instruments during analysis, ask the core facilities which software they use and which metadata these add, for more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Is there a specific reason to use Dropbox? You also have a 2TB onedrive linked to your KU Leuven account that you can use without extra costs, for more information and to compare storage solutions recommended by KU Leuven ICTS see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
